summary: 30 for 30 Present: Requiem For The Big East chronicles the meteoric ascension of the Big East conference, and how in less than a decade, it became the most successful college basketball league in America.
cast: Giancarlo Esposito|Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|Michael Adams|Red Auerbach|Marvin Barnes|Jim Boeheim|Tom Brokaw|Fred Brown|Jim Calhoun|Lou Carnesecca|Howard Cosell|John DeGioia|Ernie DiGregorio|Dave Duffy|Patrick Ewing|Dave Gavitt|Mike Gorman|Michael Graham|Andre Hawkins|Michael Jackson|Jack Kaiser|Lee Leonard|Bob Ley|Rollie Massimino|Tom Mees|Chris Mullin|Brent Musburger|Tom Odjakjian|Dick Paparo|Joe Paterno|Charles Pierce|Ed Pinckney|Rick Pitino|Bill Raftery|Ronald Reagan|Bill Reynolds|Frank Rienzo|Gene Smith|Tom Snyder|Dick Stockton|John Thompson III|John Thompson|Michael Tranghese|Sonny Vaccaro|Ray Van Ness III|Michael Vechesky|Dwayne Washington|Michael Wilbon|Kevin Williams|David Wingate|Andrew Zimbalist
title: Requiem for the Big East
